amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that repeals the D.C. residency law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the Section 149 that repeals the Residency Requirement Reinstatement Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-340).

action.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 313, 1 Present (Roll No. 410).
